accepts(FoldType) - Method in class org.netbeans.api.editor.fold.FoldType
Deprecated.
Use FoldType.isKindOf(org.netbeans.api.editor.fold.FoldType)
addChangeListener(ChangeListener) - Method in interface org.netbeans.api.editor.fold.FoldType.Domain
Attaches listener to be notified when set of FoldTypes change.
addFoldHierarchyListener(FoldHierarchyListener) - Method in class org.netbeans.api.editor.fold.FoldHierarchy
Add listener for changes done in the hierarchy.
addToHierarchy(FoldType, String, boolean, int, int, int, int, Object, FoldHierarchyTransaction) - Method in class org.netbeans.spi.editor.fold.FoldOperation
Deprecated.
please use FoldOperation.addToHierarchy(org.netbeans.api.editor.fold.FoldType, int, int, java.lang.Boolean, org.netbeans.api.editor.fold.FoldTemplate, java.lang.String, java.lang.Object, org.netbeans.spi.editor.fold.FoldHierarchyTransaction). This form of call does not support automatic state assignment and fold templates.
addToHierarchy(FoldType, int, int, Boolean, FoldTemplate, String, Object, FoldHierarchyTransaction) - Method in class org.netbeans.spi.editor.fold.FoldOperation
Adds a fold to the hierarchy.
attach(Object) - Method in class org.netbeans.spi.editor.fold.FoldInfo
Attaches custom extra info to the fold.
